Summary: SOLID BACK TRIANGLE MOVING LEFT TO RIGHT THEN SHOT STRAIGHT UP MAKING A FINT WOSHING SOUND INTERFERING WITH FLIGHT PATH TO MANCHESTER AIRPORT
divs: Sighting DetailsMY WIFE AND I WERE VISITING MY WIFE PARENTS OVER THE BANK HOLIDAY WEEKEND. ON SATURDAY THE 5TH OF MAY 2012 I WAS SAT OUT IN THE GARDEN AT 103 NANEGREIVE ROAD WATCHING THE PLANES COMING INTO LAND AT THE NEARBY MANCHESTER AIRPORT. WHEN AT APPROX 2015 HRS i SAW A BLACK TRIANGLE MOVE FROM THE EAST TO THE WEST WITH OUT MAKING ANY NOISE THEN IT HOVERED FOR A FEW SECONDS AND THEN SHOT STRAIGHT UP VERY, VERY, FAST ONLY MAKING A LOW WOSHING SOUND. THIS EVENT ONLY LASTED 15 SECONDS. AFTER THE EVENT THE PLANES STOPPED FLYING ON THAT FLIGHT PATH AND THEN 5 MINS LATER STARTED USING A DIFFERENT APPROACH PATH. when I FIRST SAW I THOUGHT AT FIRST IT COULD BE A MILITRY PLANE BUT THEN I REALIZED IT WAS NOT OF THIS WORLD AND EVEN THE STEALTHEST PLANE MAKES A NOISE BUT THERE WAS NO NOISE FROM THIS FLYING OBJECT. THERE WAS NO LIGHTS ON IT AND TO SHOT OF STRAIGHT UP LIKE IT DID IN A BLINK OF AN EYE i DONT KNOW ANY AIRCRAFT THAT CAN DO THAT WITH OUT MAKING ANY NOISE. MY REACTION WAS ONE OF AMAZEMENT THAT I SAW IT. I LIVE ON THE EDGE OF THE COTSWOLDS AND WE DO OCCASIONALLY DO SEE STRANGE LIGHTS AND OBJECTS.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Stockport
There were no other sightings in Stockport on or around May 5th 2012
